entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pikangikum
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -28.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
